name: Cup Of Ethanol
description:
A free platformer game with a bunch of unique enemies to get past.
24 levels in total, but you can also make your own!

From icy cold mountains to sweltering lava pits, travel across four different landscapes in search of pints.

Features


  • 24 main levels
  • 72 hidden treasures to collect
  • 10+ different enemy types
  • Level editor

Trailer music: Bensound
